name: figma-react-native-bridge
description: Extract design tokens and generate React Native components from Figma designs
author: Your Name

scripts.check-files: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); console.log('\nğŸ“ Checking dist files:'); try { const files = fs.readdirSync('./dist'); console.log('Files in dist:', files.length, 'files'); files.forEach(f => { const stat = fs.statSync(path.join('./dist', f)); console.log(\`  âœ… \${f}: \${(stat.size/1024).toFixed(2)}KB\`); }); console.log('\nğŸ‰ All required files present!'); } catch(e) { console.log('âŒ No dist folder found. Run npm run build first.'); }"
